reference.shortdesc: The sl element contains a simple list of items of short, phrase-like content, such as a list of materials in a kit or package.

refbody.section: On output, the list should have no bullets, on the assumption that each item is short enough to fit on one line, and needs no additional differentiation from its neighbors.

example.title: Example
example.p:
In a reference topic discussing related modules, the following sample markup could be used:
Messages

Messages from the ags_open module are identical with messages from:

ags_read ags_write ags_close

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , , and .
